title: Why is twisted treeline "currently unaailable" ?
body: okay so i know ttl is only out on certian days, but since last week when its been out it says that "category not currently available" and is greyd out. Im guessing this is for everyone and not just me? if so does anyone know why its down and if its gonna be up any time soon?

replies.body:
no
u can do it from 5-12 on tuesday and thursday nights i think
It's just a bug with the new client, relog and it will work.
